entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF FREEZING DRIZZLE THIS MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 14
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, INCREASING TO NORTH 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS ZERO TO 5 ABOVE ZERO
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
COLD WITH HIGHS 10 TO 15
CHANCE OF SNOW 70 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
NEW LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 10 ABOVE
CHANCE OF SNOW 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 20

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 5 ABOVE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
